pageContext.claim: “They're going to destroy health care. They’re going to take away health care from 180 million people. It’s going to be like a catastrophe.”
pageContext.analysis: Several leading Democrats are proposing to expand Medicare to cover all Americans. By extension, this would render the private insurance industry obsolete. But the 180 million people on private plans wouldn't be left uncovered, as Trump suggests, because they would be absorbed into the expanded Medicare system.
